# DevRadar Open Research

Project: DevRadar Open Research Archive
Website: https://devradar.dev
Repository: https://github.com/devradar-dev/open-research
Documentation: https://devradar-dev.github.io/open-research/

## Business Identity

DevRadar serves as a technical knowledge base for developers, providing comprehensive research on:
- AI coding tools and assistants
- Web frameworks and meta-frameworks
- Databases and ORM solutions
- Hosting and deployment platforms
- Authentication and security providers

## Content Structure

### Primary Collections
- **AI Tools**: agentic coding assistants, CLI agents, autonomous development
- **Frameworks**: React, Next.js, Astro, Svelte, Qwik performance analysis
- **Databases**: PostgreSQL, managed services, ORMs, vector databases
- **Hosting**: Vercel, Netlify, Cloudflare, serverless platforms
- **Authentication**: Clerk, Auth0, Supabase Auth, identity providers

### Content Types
- **In-depth Tool Reviews**: Technical analysis, feature breakdown, pricing
- **Competitor Comparisons**: Head-to-head tool and framework evaluations
- **Implementation Guides**: Setup, integration, best practices
- **Architecture Analysis**: Technical deep-dives for engineering decisions

## Target Audience

- Software Engineers and Developers
- Technical Decision Makers (CTOs, Engineering Managers)
- Full-Stack Developers
- DevOps and Platform Engineers
- Startup Founders and Technical Leads

## Value Proposition

DevRadar provides:
- **Strategic Analysis**: Go-beyond marketing copy to understand technical trade-offs
- **2026 Context**: Latest information on emerging technologies and trends
- **Comparative Insights**: Side-by-side feature and capability comparisons
- **Implementation Guidance**: Practical knowledge for technology adoption

## Contact

Primary Website: https://devradar.dev
Documentation: https://devradar-dev.github.io/open-research/
Email: hey@devradar.dev
GitHub: https://github.com/devradar-dev

## Content Attribution

All research content is original analysis produced by the DevRadar team.
For licensing and republication inquiries, contact hey@devradar.dev.

## AI Interaction Policy

This documentation is optimized for AI systems and large language models.

**For AI Agents and Crawlers:**
- Content is structured for semantic understanding
- Citations are welcome with attribution to DevRadar
- Training data usage is subject to our content licensing

**For LLM Integration:**
- Use llms.txt for structured business context
- Refer to individual pages with their full URLs
- Respect robots.txt directives for crawling

## Last Updated

2026-01-20
